title: What else could be done to those who are still information illiterate? - Quora

response.answer_text: Finding a way to survive, by having illteracy & other challenges, how can we make this work for all? I have found that the more I write, many questions go through my mind as to whether or not my punctuation is not something definitely in need of improving. Yes. I do need this. However, at my age, I hardly spent too much time writing emails, letters to the editors, etc. & have failed to remember everything I learned many moons ago. For persons who have literacy problems, I find that if they want to improve themselves, the must want it. By offering free classes for individuals who may not want to be identified in such a category, would definitely be a start.

Information, in many cases, is what your government wants you to see. Believing what they create as information, is being information illiterate. All a person can do is find their own truth among all the misinformation by questioning everything. Even then it is still your best guess.
